exercises.question: Translate to German: I come after my mother.
Translate to German: We cook for our father.
Translate to German: They sit behind the chair.
Translate to German: She goes under the table.
Translate to German: He comes from the school.
Translate to German: I play without my ball.
Translate to German: You live near your mother.
Translate to German: We are at the market.
Translate to German: I am going to the bus stop.
Translate to German: She puts the bag on the chair.
exercises.answer: sie stellt die tasche auf den stuhl

exercises.question: Translate to German: I go until the station.
Translate to German: The dog is under the table.
exercises.answer: der hund ist unter dem tisch

exercises.question: Translate to German: He is sitting in the room.
Translate to German: We are coming with our son.
Translate to German: She stands in front of the mirror.
Translate to German: I am driving against the wall.
Translate to German: Are you going through the garden?
Translate to German: I am going to the office.
Translate to German: She goes to the school.
